## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added/updated and passing (`uv run -m pytest -W error`)
- [ ] Relevant docs updated (docs/alphadocs, README, or `.github/CONTRIBUTING.md`)
- [ ] If modifying `qmtl/`: confirm you ran `git subtree push --prefix=qmtl qmtl-subtree main` and included verification in PR description
- [ ] PR includes a short description of risk and backward-compatibility
